trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja is pondering a new beverage.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near the dirigible landing)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> near Yak Awak Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Yak Awak Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>Hmmm, mixing in the more colorful vegetables might make the juice more appetizing... Oh, and we could try adding ingredients from the upper forest.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_002<tab>Hmmm, maybe instead of just mashing the vegetables, we could strain them through cloth or boil them down into a stock...?
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_003<tab>We need a drink that pairs well with the tiika selvaas. Maybe something smooth with a rich flavor...? In which case, it might be best to serve it hot...

TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_004<tab>We need a drink that pairs well with the Yak T'el salad and the stewed ty'aitya...and somehow also that suspicious-yet-popular soup. Perhaps a lighter beverage? Or maybe lean into an even spicier concoction?
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>...Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Sorry, I was just thinking about a new beverage we could serve at the kitchen.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>Are you busy at the moment? If not, I could use your help procuring the less common ingredients I have in mind...

TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>Specifically, a few bottles of spring water drawn from the reserves north of the dirigible landing. Chilled or heated, it's known for its smooth and clear taste.

TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_008<tab>Specifically, a few baskets of leopardfang tea leaves harvested from the area around Yak Awak Tsoly. It's not the easiest variety to brew, but I hear patience is rewarded with a most flavorful tea.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_009<tab>Specifically, a certain tea grass hauled up from Yak Awak Tsoly. I hear it has a rich and full-bodied flavor, bursting with the blessings of the cenote.

TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Yet only skilled fishers are able to use golden stonefly nymphs to snag the grass and fish up this precious treasure. I am, however, fully confident that you're up to the task.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>If you don't mind, I'll need a few bottles of spring water drawn from the reserves north of the dirigible landing in the upper forest.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>If you don't mind, I'll need a few baskets of leopardfang tea leaves harvested from the area around Yak Awak Tsoly.

TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_013<tab>If you don't mind, I'll need a certain tea grass hauled up from Yak Awak Tsoly. It's a little difficult to procure, but golden stonefly nymphs should help you with the task.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>Do you have the ingredient I asked for?
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_016<tab>Yes, this is wonderful quality─as will be the beverage our kitchen makes with it.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_017<tab>A juice stall in Tuliyollal, you say? I'd like to work with this Boonewa someday and see what colorful and delectable drinks we might create.
TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_018<tab>Cooking is a fine art, but I see now the world of possibility in making drinks. I can't wait to try out different mixes and enjoy them alongside our foods!

TEXT_BANMAM128_05288_KAGEELJA_000_019<tab>Imagine Gok Golma becoming a place where people from all over the nation come to relax─a place where they share their favorites from the menu, and make plans to return time and again. Wouldn't that be nice?
